content: The main goal of this course is to understand the basics of myocardial excitability related to ECG and make one confident enough to interpret the same. The course will help one to identify cardiac arrhythmias and understand the role of autonomic regulation of heart. Special attention is given to the core competencies like blood pressure measurement, ECG tracing, autonomic function testing, needed for the nurses and physician assistant providers to offer comprehensive cardiovascular care.
